◆ BM_SCANNER_OP

#define BM_SCANNER_OP (   x)
Value:
if (0 != (block = blk_blk[j+x])) \
{ int ret;\
if (BM_IS_GAP(block)) \
{ \
ret = bm::for_each_gap_blk(BMGAP_PTR(block), (r+j+x)*bm::bits_in_block,\
bit_functor); \
} \
else \
{ \
ret = bm::for_each_bit_blk(block, (r+j+x)*bm::bits_in_block,bit_functor); \
} \
if (ret < 0) return ret; \
}
